'''Holly Ordway''' is a literature academic and [[Christianity|Christian]] apologist focused on [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] and other [[Inklings]].

==Bibliography, selected==
===Books===
*[[2014]]: ''Not God's Type: An Atheist Academic Lays Down Her Arms''
*[[2017]]: ''Apologetics and the Christian Imagination: An Integrated Approach to Defending the Faith''
*[[2021]]: ''[[Tolkien's Modern Reading|Tolkien's Modern Reading: Middle-earth Beyond the Middle Ages]]''
*[[2023]]: ''[[Tolkien's Faith|Tolkien's Faith: A Spiritual Biography]]'' 

===Articles===
*[[2018]]: ''[[The Inklings and King Arthur]]: J.R.R. Tolkien, Charles Williams, C.S. Lewis, and Owen Barfield on the Matter of Britain''
**"Medieval Arthurian Sources for the Inklings: An Overview"
*[[2019]]: ''The Story of the Cosmos: How the Heavens Declare the Glory of God''
**"Recovering a Vision of the Cosmos: Tolkien's Creation Narrative" 

===Reviews===
*[[2013]]: [[Mythlore 123|''Mythlore'' 123]]
** ''Plain to the Inward Eye: Selected Essays on C.S. Lewis by Don W. King''
